00020 #include "Lgm/Lgm_MagModelInfo.h"
00021 
00022 /*
00023  *  The 39 constant parameters for the 6 T89 Kp models -- there
00024  *  is one set of 39 for each Kp level. Specifically;
00025  *
00026  *                a[0][] -> Kp =     0, 0+
00027  *                a[1][] -> Kp = 1-, 1, 1+
00028  *                a[2][] -> Kp = 2-, 2, 2+
00029  *                a[3][] -> Kp = 3-, 3, 3+
00030  *                a[4][] -> Kp = 4-, 4, 4+
00031  *                a[5][] -> Kp = >= 5-
00032  *
00033  *  Each line contains the following parameters;
00034  *  {  c1,        c2,       c3,        c4,         c5,        c6,
00035  *     c7,        c8,       c9,       c10,        c11,       c12,
00036  *    c13,       c14,      c15,       c16,        c17,       c18,
00037  *    c19,       d_x,     a_RC,       D_0,   gamma_RC,       R_c,
00038  *      G,       a_T,      D_y,       x_0,        L_y,       D_x,
00039  *   L_RC,       L_T,  gamma_T,     delta,    gamma_1,       R_T,
00040  *   x_0c,     L2_xc,     D_yc                     },
00041  *
00042  *
00043  *
00044  */
00045 static double Lgm_T89_a[6][39] = {
00046     { -98.72,   -10014.0, 15.03,    76.62,    -10237.0, 1.813, 
00047       31.10,    -0.07464, -0.07764, 0.003303, -1.129,   0.001663,
00048       0.000988, 18.21,    -0.03018, -0.03829, -0.1283,  -0.001973,     /* Kp =     0, 0+ */
00049       0.000717, 24.74,    8.161,    2.08,     -0.8799,  9.084, 
00050       3.838,    13.55,    26.94,    5.745,    10.0,     13.0, 
00051       5.0,      6.3,      4.0,      0.01,     1.0,      30.0, 
00052       4.0,      50.0,     20.0 },
00053     { -35.64,   -12800.0, 14.37,    124.5,    -13543.0, 2.316, 
00054       35.64,    -0.0741,  -0.1081,  0.003924, -1.451,   0.00202,
00055       0.00111,  21.37,    -0.04567, -0.05382, -0.1457,  -0.002742,     /* Kp = 1-, 1, 1+ */
00056       0.001244, 22.33,    8.119,    1.664,    0.9324,   9.238, 
00057       2.426,    13.81,    28.83,    6.052,    10.0,     13.0,
00058       5.0,      6.3,      4.0,      0.01,     1.0,      30.0,
00059       4.0,      50.0,     20.0 },
00060     { -77.45,   -14588.0, 64.85,    123.9,    -16229.0, 2.641, 
00061       42.46,    -0.07611, -0.1579,  0.004078, -1.391,   0.00153,
00062       0.000727, 21.86,    -0.04199, -0.06523, -0.6412,  -0.000948,     /* Kp = 2-, 2, 2+ */
00063       0.002276, 20.90,    6.283,    1.541,    4.183,    9.609, 
00064       6.591,    15.08,    30.57,    7.435,    10.0,     13.0,
00065       5.0,      6.3,      4.0,      0.01,     1.0,      30.0,
00066       4.0,      50.0,     20.0 },
00067     { -70.12,   -16125.0, 90.71,    38.08,    -19630.0, 3.181,    
00068       47.50,    -0.1327,  -0.1864,  0.01382,  -1.488,   0.002962,
00069       0.000897, 22.74,    -0.04095, -0.09223, -1.059,   -0.001766,    /* Kp = 3-, 3, 3+ */
00070       0.003034, 18.64,    6.266,    0.9351,   5.389,    8.573, 
00071       5.935,    15.63,    31.47,    8.103,    10.0,     13.0,
00072       5.0,      6.3,      4.0,      0.01,     1.0,      30.0,
00073       4.0,      50.0,     20.0 },
00074     { -162.5,   -15806.0, 160.6,    5.888,   -27534.0, 3.607, 
00075       51.10,    -0.1006,  -0.1927,  0.03353, -1.392,   0.001594,
00076       0.002439, 22.41,    -0.04925, -0.1153, -1.399,   0.000716,     /* Kp = 4-, 4, 4+ */
00077       0.002696, 18.31,    6.196,    0.7677,  5.072,    10.06, 
00078       6.668,    16.11,    30.04,    8.260,    10.0,     13.0,
00079       5.0,      6.3,      4.0,      0.01,     1.0,      30.0,
00080       4.0,      50.0,     20.0 },
00081     { -128.4,   -16184.0, 149.1,    215.5,   -36435.0, 4.090, 
00082       49.09,    -0.0231,  -0.1359,  0.01989, -2.298,   0.004911,
00083       0.003421, 21.79,    -0.05447, -0.1149, -0.2214,  -0.01355,     /* Kp >= 5-      */
00084       0.001185, 19.48,    5.831,    0.3325,  6.472,    10.47, 
00085       9.081,    15.85,    25.27,    7.976,    10.0,     13.0,
00086       5.0,      6.3,      4.0,      0.01,     1.0,      30.0,
00087       4.0,      50.0,     20.0 }
00088 };

00092 
00093 int Lgm_BT_T89( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00094 
00095 
00096     double     sin_psi, cos_psi, tan_psi;
00097     double     rho, zeta;
00098     double     x_sm, y_sm, z_sm;
00099     double     BT_xsm, BT_ysm, BT_zsm;
00100     double     h_1, h_T, D_T, W, z_s, z_r, xi_T, S_T, P, Q_T;
00101     double     W_x, W_y, z_sx, z_sy, D_Tx, D_Ty;
00102     double     p28_2, p28_4, x_sm_2, y_sm_2, y_sm_3, y_sm_4, gg, gg2, aa, aa2, hh, bb, bb2, S_T_2;
00103     double     p26_2, p29_2, p31_2, cc, cc2, pp;
00104     double     zz, ss, ss12, ss32, tt, tt12, tt32, uu, uu12, uu32, nn, oonn, ooS_T, ooP, ooS_T_2, qtzr;
00105     double    *p;
00106 
00107 
00108     p = Lgm_T89_a[Info->Kp];
00109 
00110 
00111     sin_psi = Info->c->sin_psi;
00112     cos_psi = Info->c->cos_psi;
00113     tan_psi = Info->c->tan_psi;
00114 
00115 
00116 
00117     /*
00118      * From the GSM coordinates compute the solar-magnetic coordinates (SM)
00119      */
00120     x_sm = v->x*cos_psi - v->z*sin_psi;
00121     y_sm = v->y;
00122     z_sm = v->x*sin_psi + v->z*cos_psi;
00123 
00124 
00125     p28_2 = p[28]*p[28];
00126     p28_4 = p28_2*p28_2;
00127     x_sm_2 = x_sm*x_sm;
00128     y_sm_2 = y_sm*y_sm;
00129     y_sm_3 = y_sm_2*y_sm;
00130     y_sm_4 = y_sm_2*y_sm_2;
00131     gg = y_sm_4+p28_4;
00132     gg2 = gg*gg;
00133     aa = x_sm+16.0;
00134     aa2 = aa*aa;
00135     zz = x_sm+p[23];
00136     hh = sqrt(zz*zz+16.0);
00137     pp = 3.0/2.0;
00138     cc = x_sm-p[27];
00139     cc2 = cc*cc;
00140     p26_2 = p[26]*p[26];
00141     p29_2 = p[29]*p[29];
00142     p31_2 = p[31]*p[31];
00143 
00144     ss = cc2 + p29_2;
00145     ss12 = sqrt(ss);
00146     ss32 = ss12*ss;
00147 
00148     tt = aa2+36.0;
00149     tt12 = sqrt(tt);
00150     tt32 = tt12*tt;
00151 
00152     uu = x_sm_2+p31_2;
00153     uu12 = sqrt(uu);
00154     uu32 = uu12*uu;
00155 
00156 
00157     /*
00158      *   Compute the cylindrical coords.
00159      */
00160     rho = sqrt(x_sm_2 + y_sm_2);
00161     zeta = z_sm;
00162 
00163 
00164 
00165     /*
00166      * Now compute BT(x_sm, y_sm, z_sm) i.e. in cartesian SM coords.
00167      */
00168     h_1 = 0.5*(1.0-aa/tt12);
00169     h_T = 0.5*(1.0+x_sm/uu12);
00170     D_T = p[21] + p[33]*y_sm_2 + p[32]*h_T + p[34]*h_1;
00171     D_Tx = p[32]*p31_2/(2.0*uu32) -18.0*p[34]/tt32;
00172 
00173     nn = (1.0+y_sm_2/p26_2);
00174     oonn = 1.0/nn;
00175 
00176     D_Ty = 2.0*p[33]*y_sm;
00177     W = 0.5*(1.0 - cc/ss12)*oonn;
00178     W_x = -0.5*p29_2*oonn/ss32;
00179     W_y = -2.0*y_sm*W/(y_sm_2+p26_2);
00180     z_s = 0.5*tan_psi*(zz-hh)-p[24]*sin_psi*y_sm_4/(y_sm_4+p28_4);
00181     z_sx = 0.5*(1.0 - zz/hh)*tan_psi;
00182     z_sy = -4.0*p[24]*y_sm_3*p28_4*sin_psi/gg2;
00183     z_r = z_sm - z_s;
00184     xi_T = sqrt(z_r*z_r + D_T*D_T);
00185     bb = p[25]+xi_T; bb2 = bb*bb;
00186     S_T = sqrt(rho*rho + bb2);
00187     ooS_T = 1.0/S_T;
00188     P = S_T + p[25] + xi_T; 
00189     ooP = 1.0/P;
00190     S_T_2 = S_T*S_T;
00191     ooS_T_2 = 1.0/S_T_2;
00192     Q_T = W/(xi_T*S_T) * (p[0]*ooP + p[1]*ooS_T_2);
00193     qtzr = Q_T*z_r;
00194     BT_xsm = qtzr * x_sm;
00195     BT_ysm = qtzr * y_sm;
00196     BT_zsm = W*ooS_T * (p[0]+p[1]*(p[25]+xi_T)*ooS_T_2) 
00197          + (x_sm*W_x+y_sm*W_y)*ooP*(p[0]+p[1]*ooS_T)
00198          + BT_xsm*z_sx + BT_ysm*z_sy 
00199          - Q_T*D_T*(x_sm*D_Tx+y_sm*D_Ty);
00200     
00201 
00202 
00203 
00204     /*
00205      * Now transform BT(x_sm, y_sm, z_sm) -> BT(x, y, z)
00206      */
00207     B->x =  BT_xsm*cos_psi + BT_zsm*sin_psi;
00208     B->y =  BT_ysm;
00209     B->z = -BT_xsm*sin_psi + BT_zsm*cos_psi;
00210 
00211     return(1);
00212 
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00216 
00217 int Lgm_BRC_T89( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ){
00218 
00219 
00220     double     sin_psi, cos_psi, tan_psi;
00221     double     rho, zeta;
00222     double     x, y, z, x_sm, y_sm, z_sm;
00223     double     BRC_xsm, BRC_ysm, BRC_zsm;
00224     double     h_1, h_RC, D_RC, z_s, z_r, xi_RC, S_RC, Q_RC;
00225     double     z_sx, z_sy, D_RCx;
00226     double     p28_2, p28_4, y_sm_2, y_sm_3, y_sm_4, gg, gg2, ff, ff2, S_RC2, S_RC3, S_RC_5, hh;
00227     double     x_sm_2, ee, ss, ss12, ss32, tt, tt12, tt32, p30_2, qrczr;
00228     double    *p;
00229 
00230 
00231     p = Lgm_T89_a[Info->Kp];
00232 
00233 
00234     x = v->x; y = v->y; z = v->z;
00235 
00236 
00237     sin_psi = Info->c->sin_psi;
00238     cos_psi = Info->c->cos_psi;
00239     tan_psi = Info->c->tan_psi;
00240 
00241 
00242 
00243     /*
00244      * From the GSM coordinates compute the solar-magnetic coordinates (SM)
00245      */
00246     x_sm = v->x*cos_psi - v->z*sin_psi;
00247     y_sm = v->y;
00248     z_sm = v->x*sin_psi + v->z*cos_psi;
00249 
00250 
00251 
00252     /*
00253      * From SM coords compute the cylindrical coords
00254      */
00255     rho = sqrt(x_sm*x_sm + y_sm*y_sm);
00256     zeta = z_sm;
00257 
00258 
00259     p28_2 = p[28]*p[28];
00260     p28_4 = p28_2*p28_2;
00261     x_sm_2 = x_sm*x_sm;
00262     y_sm_2 = y_sm*y_sm;
00263     y_sm_3 = y_sm_2*y_sm;
00264     y_sm_4 = y_sm_2*y_sm_2;
00265     gg = y_sm_4+p28_4;
00266     gg2 = gg*gg;
00267     ee = x_sm+p[23];
00268     hh = sqrt(ee*ee+16.0);
00269     
00270     ff = x_sm+16.0;
00271     ff2 = ff*ff;
00272 
00273     ss = ff2+36.0;
00274     ss12 = sqrt(ss);
00275     ss32 = ss12*ss;
00276 
00277     p30_2 = p[30]*p[30];
00278 
00279     tt = x_sm_2 + p30_2;
00280     tt12 = sqrt(tt);
00281     tt32 = tt12*tt;
00282 
00283 
00284     /*
00285      * Now compute BRC(x_sm, y_sm, z_sm) i.e. in cartesian SM coords.
00286      */
00287     h_1 = 0.5*(1.0-ff/ss12);
00288     h_RC = 0.5*(1.0+x_sm/tt12);
00289     D_RC = p[21] + p[22]*h_RC + p[34]*h_1;
00290     D_RCx = 0.5*p[22]*p[30]*p[30]/tt32 -18.0*p[34]/ss32;
00291     z_s = 0.5*tan_psi*(ee-hh) -p[24]*sin_psi*y_sm_4/(y_sm_4+p28_4);
00292     z_sx = 0.5*(1.0 - ee/hh)*tan_psi;
00293     z_sy = -4.0*p[24]*y_sm_3*p28_4*sin_psi/gg2;
00294     z_r = z_sm - z_s;
00295     xi_RC = sqrt(z_r*z_r + D_RC*D_RC);
00296     ff = p[20]+xi_RC; ff2 = ff*ff;
00297     S_RC = sqrt(rho*rho + ff2);
00298     S_RC2 = S_RC*S_RC; S_RC3 = S_RC2*S_RC; S_RC_5 = S_RC2*S_RC3;
00299     Q_RC = 3.0*p[4]/(xi_RC*S_RC_5)*(p[20]+xi_RC);
00300     qrczr = Q_RC*z_r;
00301     BRC_xsm = qrczr * x_sm;
00302     BRC_ysm = qrczr * y_sm;
00303     BRC_zsm = p[4]*(2.0*ff2-rho*rho)/S_RC_5 + BRC_xsm*z_sx + BRC_ysm*z_sy - Q_RC*D_RC*x_sm*D_RCx;
00304 
00305 
00306 
00307 
00308 
00309     /*
00310      * Now transform BRC(x_sm, y_sm, z_sm) -> BRC(x, y, z)
00311      */
00312     B->x = BRC_xsm*cos_psi + BRC_zsm*sin_psi;
00313     B->y = BRC_ysm;
00314     B->z = -BRC_xsm*sin_psi + BRC_zsm*cos_psi;
00315 
00316     return(1);
00317 
00318 }
00319 
00320 
00321 
00322 int Lgm_BM_T89( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00323 
00324     double     sin_psi, cos_psi;
00325     double     x, y, y2, z, z2, exod_x;
00326     double    *p;
00327 
00328 
00329     p = Lgm_T89_a[Info->Kp];
00330 
00331     sin_psi = Info->c->sin_psi;
00332     cos_psi = Info->c->cos_psi;
00333 
00334     x = v->x;
00335     y = v->y; y2 = y*y;
00336     z = v->z; z2 = z*z;
00337     
00338     exod_x = exp(x/p[19]);
00339 
00340     B->x = exod_x * (p[5] * z * cos_psi + (p[6] + p[7] * y2 + p[8] * z2) * sin_psi);
00341     B->y = exod_x * (p[9] * y * z * cos_psi + (p[10] * y + p[11] * y*y2 + p[12] * y * z2) *sin_psi);
00342     B->z = exod_x * ((p[13] + p[14] * y2 + p[15] * z2) * cos_psi + (p[16] * z + p[17] * z * y2 + p[18] * z*z2) * sin_psi);
00343 
00344     return(1);
00345 }
00346 
00347 
00348 int Lgm_BC_T89( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00349 
00350     double     sin_psi, cos_psi, x, y, z;
00351     double     W_c, W_cx, W_cy, S_p, S_m;
00352     double     F_px, F_mx, F_py, F_my, F_pz, F_mz; 
00353     double     p38_2, aa, aa2;
00354     double     x2, y2, x2py2, zpp35, zmp35, wcx, wcy, cc, dd, ff, gg, ffcc, ggdd, zz;
00355     double     psp, ss, ss12, ss32, ee, oop38_2;
00356     double    *p;
00357 
00358 
00359     p = Lgm_T89_a[Info->Kp];
00360 
00361 
00362     x = v->x;
00363     y = v->y;
00364     z = v->z;
00365 
00366     x2 = x*x;
00367     y2 = y*y;
00368 
00369     x2py2 = x2 + y2;
00370 
00371     sin_psi = Info->c->sin_psi;
00372     cos_psi = Info->c->cos_psi;
00373 
00374     p38_2 = p[38]*p[38];
00375     oop38_2 = 1.0/p38_2;
00376     ee = 1.0/(1.0+y2*oop38_2);
00377     aa = x-p[36];
00378     aa2 = aa*aa;
00379 
00380     zpp35 = z+p[35];
00381     zmp35 = z-p[35];
00382 
00383     ss = aa2+p[37];
00384     ss12 = sqrt(ss);
00385     ss32 = ss*ss12;
00386 
00387     /*
00388      * Compute BC(x, y, z)  i.e. in GSM coords.
00389      */
00390     W_c = 0.5*(1.0-aa/ss12)*ee;
00391     W_cx = -0.5*p[37]*ee/ss32;
00392     W_cy = -2.0*y*W_c/(y2+p38_2);
00393     S_p = sqrt(zpp35*zpp35 + x2py2);
00394     S_m = sqrt(zmp35*zmp35 + x2py2);
00395 
00396     wcx = W_c*x;
00397     wcy = W_c*y;
00398 
00399     cc = 1.0/S_p;
00400     dd = 1.0/S_m;
00401     ff = 1.0/(S_p+zpp35);
00402     gg = 1.0/(S_m-zmp35);
00403 
00404     ffcc = ff*cc;
00405     ggdd = gg*dd;
00406 
00407     zz = x*W_cx+y*W_cy;
00408 
00409     F_px =  wcx*ffcc;
00410     F_mx = -wcx*ggdd;
00411     F_py =  wcy*ffcc;
00412     F_my = -wcy*ggdd;
00413     F_pz =  W_c*cc + zz*ff;
00414     F_mz =  W_c*dd + zz*gg;
00415 
00416     psp = p[3]*sin_psi;
00417 
00418     B->x = p[2]*(F_px + F_mx) + psp*(F_px - F_mx);
00419     B->y = p[2]*(F_py + F_my) + psp*(F_py - F_my);
00420     B->z = p[2]*(F_pz + F_mz) + psp*(F_pz - F_mz);
00421 
00422     return(1);
00423 }
00424

00426 
00427 
00428 
00429 int Lgm_B_T89( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00430 
00431     Lgm_Vector      B1, B2, B3, B4, B5;
00432 
00433 
00434     Lgm_BT_T89(  v, &B1, Info );
00435     Lgm_BRC_T89( v, &B2, Info );
00436     Lgm_BM_T89(  v, &B3, Info );
00437     Lgm_BC_T89(  v, &B4, Info );
00438     switch ( Info->InternalModel ){
00439 
00440         case LGM_CDIP:
00441                         Lgm_B_cdip( v, &B5, Info );
00442                         break;
00443         case LGM_EDIP:
00444                         Lgm_B_edip( v, &B5, Info );
00445                         break;
00446         case LGM_IGRF:
00447                         Lgm_B_igrf( v, &B5, Info );
00448                         break;
00449         default:
00450                         fprintf(stderr, "Lgm_B_T89: Unknown internal model (%d)\n", Info->InternalModel );
00451                         break;
00452 
00453     }
00454 
00455 
00456 
00457 
00458 
00459     B->x = B1.x + B2.x + B3.x + B4.x + B5.x;
00460     B->y = B1.y + B2.y + B3.y + B4.y + B5.y;
00461     B->z = B1.z + B2.z + B3.z + B4.z + B5.z;
00462 /*
00463     B->x = B5.x;
00464     B->y = B5.y;
00465     B->z = B5.z;
00466     */
00467 
00468 
00469     ++Info->nFunc;
00470 
00471     return(1);
00472 
00473 }
00474 
00475 
00476 /*
00477  *   $id$
00478  */
